subject: Re: Aaaaa at last, the purpose of life. [1 Attachment]
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
So if you're not Christian, you have all the time in the world?

 Yeah, I get some saying it's this month, or next month, or August, or October. I'll stick with December 2012, and even that I'm not taking to the bank.

 FYI, rapture ain't in the bible. I wouldn't want to be stuck in/with this body --forever--wrong frikin' gender! And species.

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> Great file Frank!  Says, "time on earth" then a different person says,  "is 
> it?"  They are talking about the limited time we are going to be here  now, 
> if you are Christian and believe, you will be taken up, body and all,  
> believers will be the only ones that see Him in the sky, our physical body will  
> be changed, and it won't hurt, the sensation will fell like when someone  
> stretches, the adrenalin will kick in, we disappear to others around us, and 
> up  we go!  I am told it will be soon now, all I got to say is,   Yikes!  sf
>  
>  
> In a message dated 2/6/2011 3:41:15 A.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
> purplealiengirl@... writes:
> 
>
